About me

My name is Fritz Ashley B. Ereneta. and i am a 2nd year College student currently taking BS Information technologist at Adventist University of the Phillipines in Puting,Kahoy silang,Cavite. Everyone can say that i am Normal Student and i am still trying to learn the things in my life.

SKILLS

Confidence around a computer

To me when i am on a computer i feel like a person who likes to rome around the internet searching for information about the IT field and many more.

Resourcefulness

because most of what I know is the result of searching for the answer in search engines such as google. There is an art to searching for answers on the internet and it is a vital skill for any programmer.

Communictation skills

As a programmer or a IT technicial communication is required because you will need to talk to your colleagues so that you can finish you work fast but for me I am not a talkative person i do tend to be quiet when there is a group work but sometimes i do give some ideas on what to do but not that much so as i try to talk as much as possible i will have a good communication skills to my colleagues.

Inquisitive mind

I am not a smart person but i am trying to find ways to improve my thinking ability .
